channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15236] Fix typo in RequestHedgingProxyProvider and RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider
item.description:
Typo 'configred' in RequestHedgingProxyProvider and RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider.

 * standbys. Once it receive a response from any one of the configred proxies,
item.summary: Fix typo in RequestHedgingProxyProvider and RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Thank you gabor.bota for providing the patch! Would you fix a typo in RequestHedgingRMFailoverProxyProvider.java as well?
Yes, sure. Is there a ticket for it?
This issue is the ticket. Would you include the fix into the patch to fix the typo in this issue?
You are right, missed it, I've searched for the string and no other result came up just the RequestHedgingProxyProvider. I've submitted the new patch which fixes both.
